rows.label: qst300201_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, just in time. The Merc
Group is running smoothly.

rows.label: qst300201_msg0002
rows.name:
But while everyone appreciates what
you're doing for the Merc Group...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst300201_msg0003
rows.name:
there are some guys who won't
accept anyone but Vandham-san.

rows.label: qst300201_msg0004
rows.name:
Trust isn't something you gain
overnight. I think it can't be helped.

rows.label: qst300201_msg0005
rows.name: So, we all discussed what to do.

rows.label: qst300201_msg0006
rows.name:
We'd like you to have a
sparring match with some
of our skilled members.

rows.label: qst300201_msg0007
rows.name:
If they see your skills firsthand,
they should come to accept and
trust the new leader.

rows.label: qst300201_msg0008
rows.name:
You're very understanding.
That's a big help.

rows.label: qst300201_msg0009
rows.name:
Then, I'd like you to head
to the training ground.

rows.label: qst300201_msg0010
rows.name:
The guys who want to
spar are waiting there.

rows.label: qst300201_msg0011
rows.name:
Just because they're mercenaries
here, don't hold back!

rows.label: qst300201_msg0101
rows.name:
The sparring match will be at the
training ground. Please go there.
